name: Pizza
overview: Pizza is a simple game in which the player must deliver pizzas to earn money. The player can choose how many pizzas he or she must deliver. Once started the player will receive orders and must point the driver to the right location on the grid, by giving the coordinates of the final address as marked on the map. If the player gives the wrong coordinate the player loses some money and must try again. There is no time limit or high-scores table.
